item.description:
Join us for something a little different, a classic French film!

Here is some info on the movie: http://amherstcinema....

Anyone who wants to come early for conversation please meet at Amherst Coffee (28 Amity Street) at 6:30 pm.

If meeting at Amherst Coffee, you may want to buy your ticket a little earlier as last time we went to a movie there the theater was almost full. Amherst Coffee and the theater are around the corner from each other.

Otherwise we'll see you in the lobby of the theater.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Amherst Coffee at 6:30 pm or in theater lobby prior to film.
item.name: French Movie: Les Vacances de Monsieur Hulot
